item.title: [PI]Command that makes you logout after 5 SecondS![/PI]
item.dc:creator: @RiiPiiNFtW RiiPiiNFtW
item.description:
@RiiPiiNFtW wrote:

Stop being trolls kids. If he wants the command then let him use it and stop post farming. If he asks for help then HELP him. This section is called “Server Help” not “Server Help to Troll.”

OT: Use an EventManager to do this. PlayerHandler.updateStartTime = System.currentTimeMillis(); Use if statements for each message sent and use thie method above^.

Read full topic

ok this is for Voting , when you vote on my server and you don’t log out before you vote you don’t revice the reward, but if you do logout in the next 5 secs while he is voting he can log back in and have his points!

if (playerCommand.equals("Vote")) { c.getPA().sendFrame126("www.roatpkz.com/vote.php", 12000); //after 5 secs then c.sendMessage("5 secs until logout"); c.sendMessage("4 secs until logout"); c.sendMessage("3 secs until logout"); c.sendMessage("2 secs until logout"); c.sendMessage("1 secs until logout"); c.logout(); }
